original_title: Lisa Nilsson: Samlade sånger på turné
overview: After summing up his career with the success story "Samlede Sånger 1992-2003", Lisa Nilsson wanted to go out and play.  The crowd was invited to a string of hits like "Himlen Runt Hörnet", "Den Här Gången", "Varje Gång Jag Ser Dig" and "Långsamt Farväl". The tour was 15 concerts around Sweden, Denmark, Finland and Norway. During a magic night at the Circus in Stockholm on April 29, 2003, the concert was filmed for crowded audiences. What a night! What a concert!
title: Lisa Nilsson: Samlade sånger på turné
